Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prevents interactive computer service providers from knowingly or negligently promoting developed content that is dangerous or otherwise injurious to minors
Summary: Prevents interactive computer service providers from knowingly or negligently promoting developed content that is dangerous or otherwise injurious to minors; assesses a civil penalty to social media networks that knowingly or negligently promote such content.
LawCode: Add ยง394-ccc, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to preventing interactive computer service providers from knowingly or negligently promoting developed content that is dangerous or otherwise injurious to minors
